shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the local user does not receive the data stream from the remote user within five seconds.

section.p: This callback indicates that the local user has not received the stream message sent by the remote user invoking the method.

plentry.pd: @param uid User ID of the remote user sending the message.
Stream ID of the received message.
The error code where the error occurred. Error Codes and Warning Codes
@param cached Number of incoming cached messages when the data stream is interrupted.
